Summary: burst of light that was oval shaped then ended with a shooting star tail
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dogs out in my backyard then I look up at the sky and this light blue flare, or flash appears in the sky and spreads into an oval and like a firework it burst out but just disappear's then it ends with a shooting star like tail. again to be more specific it was an oval shaped flare that was all blue no spaces then disappeared and ended with a shooting star-like tail. I thought this object was a U.F.O but then I thought it was a shooting star, but shooting stars don't flare at the beginning of they're appearance. when it was active the U.F.O was going down, I also noticed that it was SECONDS before the sun came up. my feeling's were going crazy, I was scared, nervous, and excited I went inside to tell my mom and I told her and she was in shock too. I finally faced my fears then went back out-side to feed my dog's (they had no reaction to this event.) I stayed out there to see if I see anything else, but the results I didn't see anything else in the sky.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There was one other sighting in Austin on or around October 7th 2010
